channel.title: Ok please help with my server
channel.description: I followed the tutorial to make a server i have:JDK, a no-ip, downloaded no-ip, i have a source, and im pretty sure i portforwarded right. But people still cant get on my server help me please! I can compile it, and run it but other people cant log on! I can get on local host though P.S if you think its my portorwarding (i do think i did it right) i have a belkin router and i found one that shows what to do and i did it!

item.title: Ok please help with my server
item.dc:creator: @vinku12 vinku12
item.description:
@vinku12 wrote:

i got same problem[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 21, 2009, 06:24:27 am[/size][hr]and i have done portforwarding correctly…

Read full topic
item.source: Ok please help with my server

item.title: Ok please help with my server
item.dc:creator: @kingofnone kingofnone
item.description:
@kingofnone wrote:

if its portforwarding, here is a somewhat universal step…
a. go to whatever your default gateway’s ip is in your browser…(common sense right…)
b. sign in(belkin factory password is admin
OR blank… can’t remember…)
c.go to gaming part(forgot what its called on belkin)
d.type in your default gateway in the boxes that say it…?
[###][###][##][#]
make sure you have…TCP marked not ucp or anything else thats up there… port is standard port unless you feel like being weird… 43594… or is it 43954…? idk always forget…
(i was told to do this… idk if it helped…) anyways
make a second one
do the same thing
lable port 5555…? and lable it game2(i used game1 as my rs2server name)
now heres the fun part!!!
click save!!
if thats the problem then it should be fixed… if not heres another common problem…
A.you don’t have enviormental variables set right… go to your path thingy and check the java on it…?
B. enable the server and port in your allowances in firewall…
(blahblah.no-ip.org or… blahblah.servegame.com you get the point… your “no-ip’s” ip… and put the port you used for GAME 1 not the second… fun part again… save it!!! WOW!!! WE WELCOME TO MOPARSCAPE>>? if not message me we will get this shit done

Read full topic
item.source: Ok please help with my server
